content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Collection chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Copper Production Line at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0) mining copper ore
- Collection chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0) smelting copper plates
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Production Line at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0) mining iron ore
- Collection chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0) smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5) feeding assembling machine
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5) crafting automation science packs
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5) moving packs to output
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Additional furnace (14.0, 14.0)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5) providing water
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0) heating water to steam
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5) generating power
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electricity distribution network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if production line is actually producing items before trying to collect them

### Errors with missing crafting ingredients
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor ingredient levels and replenish when low

### Resource shortages
- Keep mining drills fueled with coal to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor fuel levels in all burner devices (inserters, mining drills, furnaces)
- Ensure proper connection between mining, smelting and assembly steps

### Production line stoppages
- Check for breaks in item transport chain
- Verify inserters are properly positioned and fueled
- Monitor input/output chest contents regularly
